def_cn: （书、戏剧、电影或故事中品行端正的）男主角，男主人公
def_en: The hero of a book, play, film, or story is the main male character, who usually has good qualities.

def_cn: （尤指男性）英雄，英雄人物，豪杰，勇士
def_en: A hero is someone, especially a man, who has done something brave, new, or good, and who is therefore greatly admired by a lot of people.

def_cn: 偶像;崇拜对象;心目中的英雄
def_en: If you describe someone as your hero, you mean that you admire them a great deal, usually because of a particular quality or skill that they have.
